content:
Please expand on this so that I can give your exact instructions to my webiste dsigner. 

Please give me all the copy, layout, and image/icon (if any) suggestions 

[ Call-to-action section: A section that encourages visitors to take a specific action, such as signing up for a newsletter, downloading a free resource, or making a purchase. ]: (that you mentioned for the home page)

The CTA should be to buy my course (not sign up. I don't want to use any forms I just want to use a button that takes the user to my checkout page"
